thread.title: Carlyle-backed Brazilian toy retailer sets price range for IPO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Carlyle-backed Brazilian toy retailer sets price range for IPO
text: March 7, 2018 / 8:55 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago Carlyle-backed Brazilian toy retailer sets price range for IPO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read SAO PAULO, March 7 (Reuters) - Brazilian toy retailer Ri Happy Brinquedos SA set the price range for its initial public offering between 20.30 reais and 26.30 reais per share, according to a securities filing on Wednesday. Ri Happy and its controlling shareholder, Carlyle Group LP , intend to raise around 861 million reais ($265.86 million) with the offering, with pricing scheduled for March 27. $1 = 3.2385 reais Reporting by Carolina Mandl Editing by Leslie Adler
